name: Find The Light
description:
First Ludum Dare (#34) and fully completed game.

Use A and D to move the plant left and right, avoiding rocks and collecting water droplets. Make sure to keep your hydration bar above 0% if you want to stay alive. Reach the top of the screen and sprout into a flower.

Ludum Dare Page: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=p...
